name: Botanophobic Zombies
description:
Made in 2020 for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was "Keep it Alive."

  • Botanophobic Zombies is a game where you are tasked to protect a plant from waves of zombies.
  • The plant is protecting you from a deadly airborne parasite.
  • Left click to attack the zombie waves with your diamond.
  • Right click to use your watering can on it once its HP is low.
  • Survive until 6:00.
  • But most importantly: keep it alive.
